io.druid.indexing.overlord

Class ThreadPoolTaskRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.overlord.ThreadPoolTaskRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskRunner, QuerySegmentWalker

    public class ThreadPoolTaskRunner
extends Object
implements TaskRunner, QuerySegmentWalker
    Runs tasks in a JVM thread using an ExecutorService.
